notes: Well-maintained apartment in Da'an with a furnished living room, two bedrooms with hardwood floors, recessed and cove lighting, AC units, and decent natural light from large windows. One small room (image 5) shows a dirty/damaged mattress on dark flooring which is a cleanliness red flag â€” confirm whether this will be cleaned or removed before move-in.
